stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in San Jose
stateCompliance.content: Santa Clara County residents are protected by California's strict consumer protection laws. The DFPI enforces regulations to ensure fair lending practices.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (460% APR typical)
Only one active loan allowed at a time
Lenders cannot pursue criminal prosecution for non-payment
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and compliant
One $15 NSF fee maximum per bounced check
Disclosures required in your preferred language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only. California cash advance laws may be updated. For current regulatory information, contact DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. For specific legal advice, consult a licensed California attorney.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Silicon Valley Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our San Jose location? We serve these surrounding Silicon Valley cities:

faq.question: Where is your San Jose location?
faq.answer: We're located at 234 Park Avenue, Suite 150, right near the Tech Museum in downtown San Jose. Take I-280 or I-880 to Exit 9 toward Park Avenue. Ample parking is available.

faq.question: How quickly can I get cash in San Jose?
faq.answer: Most applicants receive same-day approval and funding. Bring your ID, proof of income, and checking account information. The process typically takes 30-45 minutes.

faq.question: What's the maximum I can borrow?
faq.answer: California law limits payday loans to $300 including all fees. With our standard 15% fee, you can typically borrow up to $255 in cash.

faq.question: Are your fees transparent?
faq.answer: Yes. California requires all fees to be clearly disclosed upfront. For a $200 loan, the fee is $30. For $255, the maximum fee is $45. No hidden charges.

faq.question: Can I verify your DFPI license?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can verify Lion Cash Advance's California license at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/ or call 1-866-275-2677.
